original_text: There I have placed the ark, in which is the covenant of the Lord that he made with the people of Israel.”
korean_text: 내가 또 그 곳에 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손과 더불어 세우신 언약을 넣은 궤를 두었노라 하니라

sentences.original_text: There I have placed the ark
in which is the covenant of the Lord
that he made with the people of Israel
